item.title: iPad Jones. Iâ€™ve Got An iPad Jones
item.description:
I’ve been interested in e-book readers since the Amazon Kindle was released. The idea of carrying many books conveniently is appealing. Even better is the ability to enlarge the font size for reading without glasses. Plus, not needing shelf space for dusty books is a definite advantage. However, I haven’t purchased one because I don’t read books constantly anymore. The interactive nature of the internet holds my attention more effectively. An e-book reader combined with an internet-capable computer would be amazing!..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ipad-jones-i-ve-got-an-ipad-jones/

item.title: Ethernet over Copper Rising Rapidly
item.description:
Enhanced business environments and productivity gains through automation are pushing businesses towards higher bandwidth network solutions. Instead of simply increasing their current T1 or other line services, smart managers are exploring new technology that delivers more bandwidth at a lower cost. Ethernet over Copper is emerging as a leading WAN network service. Ethernet over Copper (EoC) is a straightforward concept: it’s an Ethernet service delivered through existing twisted pair copper wiring...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ethernet-over-copper-rising-rapidly/
